summary:
An optimist with 7 years experience in Recruitment and People & Culture function in public companies, startups (seed-stage), scale-ups (Series C) and consulting. 

I like to spark joy in teams, 
Position employees for wins, 
And enable candidates to be successful by all means.

(If you have a better rhyme suggestion for the candidates, I'm all ears 😁)


Talent Acquisition | Recruitment | People & Culture | Data-driven | Candidate Experience | Onboarding | Employer Branding | People Development | Employee Experience | Tech | Fintech | SaaS | Luxury Industry

school.name: Zuyd Hogeschool | Zuyd University of Applied Sciences

education.degree_name: Master of Science (MSc) International Human Resource Management

certifications.name: Nano Tips to Sharpen Your Critical Thinking with Shadé Zahrai

profile_positions.description:
𝗣𝗲𝗼𝗽𝗹𝗲 & 𝗖𝘂𝗹𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲
- Leading a team of 3 Talent Acquisition Partners
- Setting up for success the TA team by structuring their onboarding, defining the goals and processes and providing the tools to succeed
- Putting in place and animating TA weekly meetings to align on the team's priorities and objectives

𝗧𝗮𝗹𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗔𝗰𝗾𝘂𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗷𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘀
- Conducting Trainings for the Benelux & Nordics Executive Committee and Hiring Managers (from Richemont, Cartier and other Maisons) covering the best interviewing practices and how to objectively assess candidates through various tools and methodologies. 
- Developing and implementing the first KPIs for the Benelux & Nordics TA team to enable data-driven decisions in recruitment
- Creating and sharing Monthly and Quarterly TA reports with the HR Director Benelux & Nordics
- Building the first TA roadmap for the Benelux & Nordics region with a yearly strategy, clear goals for the team and an action plan 
- Elevating the TA function in the region by bringing structure, direction and strategy aligned with business needs and enabling proactive recruitment

𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗿𝘂𝗶𝘁𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀
- Successfully delivering on recruitment needs in a fast-paced environment (60+ recruitments for « Head of » and Management positions, Office and Client Relations Center roles)
- Actively addressing unconscious bias in recruitment through the Recruitment Training for Hiring Managers, the use of the Predictive Index tool (behavioral and cognitive assessment) and enabling managers to make more informed decisions when it comes to hiring
- Partnering with Hiring Managers and HR Business Partners and building trusting relationships
- Providing regular insights to Hiring Managers on talent trends on the market and recruitment best practices
- Taking ownership of the end-to-end Referral Program processes and ensuring that all referrals are handled accordingly

Tools: SAP Analytics Clouds, SuccessFactors (ATS)
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Partner Benelux & Nordics

profile_positions.description:
Biller is the next step in business payments; a fintech startup with an AI-powered “Buy Now, Pay Later” payment method for B2B.

Key Projects and Achievements:

𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗿𝘂𝗶𝘁𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁
- Hired for Tech and Business roles
- Held 2 Interview Trainings for Hiring Managers and hiring teams
- Created a Talent Acquisition roadmap with monthly and quarterly objectives
- Built a scalable Hiring Workflow implementing Job Scorecards in the ATS system and adding Kickoff meetings to the opening of new positions
- Conducted Headcount planning sessions with Hiring Managers to align on future hiring needs and enable proactive recruitment
- Optimized the ATS (Workable) so the organization can get the most value out of it
- Designed and launched a Candidate Survey and derived an action plan in order to improve and provide the best in class Candidate Experience

𝗘𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗼𝘆𝗲𝗿 𝗯𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴
- Increased Social Media visibility by introducing the "Biller equals" bi-weekly posts to attract top talent
- Collaborated with the Marketing team on content for a new Careers page

𝗣𝗲𝗼𝗽𝗹𝗲 & 𝗖𝘂𝗹𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲
- Created and launched the first Employee Wellbeing Survey
- Designed the first Internship program and journey

Tools: Workable (ATS), Slack
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Business Partner

profile_positions.description:
Kaizo, a Workforce Performance Management platform that turns support teams into support heroes.
Raised a $7 million seed round, co-led by Gradient (Google’s AI venture fund), Partech, and Fortino Capital.

Leading and owning Recruitment, People & Culture strategy and operations.

Reporting into the CEO, my scope includes all people related processes, combining Recruitment & Employer Branding, Onboarding, People Development & Engagement, Culture, People Operations and HR Processes. 

Key Projects and Achievements:

𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗿𝘂𝗶𝘁𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁
- 9 hires (Tech and Commercial profiles)
- Managed 1 HR Generalist
- Built and owned annual Recruitment & People Strategy, Hiring Roadmap and set up annual Budget
- Designed Recruitment Dashboard, KPIs, Recruitment Capacity Forecast, OKRs and HR Reports
- Improved Recruitment Process quality and Hiring Workflow (e.g. Job Scorecards, ATS upgrade and automation)
- Increased candidate pipeline: +320%
- Created a Referral Program
- Diversity: increased female ratio from 25% to 34%, and +5 nationalities (22 nationalities in a team of 29 people)
 
𝗣𝗲𝗼𝗽𝗹𝗲 & 𝗖𝘂𝗹𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲
- Created a Quarterly Performance Review framework
- Set up a data-driven Onboarding process (e.g. Surveys and Astonishment Reports)
- Led Employee Engagement initiatives: Suggestion Box, bi-annual Engagement Survey, Communication guidelines 
- Supported the Co-founders with finding a New office
- Organised a Dutch course program for on-site team: 12 weeks courses
- Workation team event for on-site and remote team: 1 week in Lisbon
- NEW Benefits (e.g. Calm application, Distributed Offices, Mentorship Program process)
- HR projects: relocation process, visa extensions, contract renewals

𝗘𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗼𝘆𝗲𝗿 𝗯𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴
- Social media content (e.g. “Meet the team” & “Why Kaizo?”): 32 posts
- 2 hiring events
- NEW careers page
- Glassdoor company page: 6 positive reviews

Tools: Recruitee (ATS), Slack, Notion, Figma, Miro
profile_positions.title: Head of People & Culture

profile_positions.description:
KEYTEO, an international and independent group, supports companies in the optimization of their performance. 

Main responsibilities as an IT Recruiter:

✔️ Recruitment
- Analysis and understanding of our customers' needs in collaboration with the Sales team
- Sourcing of candidates using various job boards, internal database and LinkedIn
- Ensuring best in class Candidate Experience from 1st interview to job Offer and Onboarding

✔️ People & Culture
- Coaching of candidates before meeting our clients
- Follow-up of consultants during their missions
- Creation of an internal newsletter

Tools: BoondManager (ATS)
profile_positions.title: IT Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
A traveltech startup, Smartrenting empowers travelers by removing the housing hurdle.
Smartrenting is a real estate agency with an online platform for short-term rental and sublet for outbound travelers.

✔️ Talent Acquisition
- High volume recruitment of generalist and technical profiles (18 hires in three months) 
- Developing KPIs and activity monitoring 
- Onboarding of new employees
- Organizing and participating in student fairs

✔️ Candidate Experience
- Implementing recruitment processes 
- Providing constructive feedback
- Training hiring managers to recruitment and interviewing
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Meero, a French startup and unicorn, offers online editing and production tools for photographers by relying on tech and AI.

✔️ Talent Acquisition
- Sourcing (Boolean search)
- Recruitment (25 hires in six months, international generalist profiles)
- Improvement of recruitment processes
- Onboarding of new employees

✔️ HR projects 
- Campus management 
- Training of hiring managers
- Employer branding

Tools : Lever (ATS), Slack
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Specialist

profile_positions.description:
SERIAL, a Positive Thinking Partner, is a Swiss company dedicated to IT services and specialised in digital transformation.
Based in Geneva, Zurich and Lausanne, we are experts in Digital Transformation, Web, Mobile, IOT, ECM, Big Data, Business Intelligence, Security, and Software Engineering. 

Main responsibilities as an IT Sourcer and Recruiter:

✔️ Recruitment
-	Working in collaboration with Business Managers
-	Proactive sourcing using Boolean search (job boards, internal database, social networks, forums)
-	CV Screening (developers, project managers, business analysts, solution architects…)
-	Conducting phone and face to face interviews
-	Managing technical interviews with our consultants
-	Checking references with previous employers
-	Candidate care, giving feedback and ensuring a positive experience for candidates
-	Proposals and salary negotiation

✔️ People & Culture
-	Following-up new employees' integration during their contract and trial period
-	Coaching candidates and consultants for client interviews
-	Career evolution
-	Updating consultants' profile resumes

Tools : Microsoft Access (ATS)
profile_positions.title: IT Sourcer and Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
Evian: one of the world's top producers of mineral water and a subsidiary of the French food processing group Danone

✔️ People Development
- Performing an inventory of the essential training required for an operator position on a packaging line
- Helping and guiding 130 employees throughout the process for the creation of their Personal Account of Training on the web portal 
- Creation of a training tool for an incompany supply store aimed at welcoming the newcomers

✔️ HR Processes
- Accompanying workshop managers in filling out their Individual Development Plan (IDP) on the HRIS "Cornerstone" platform
- Participating in the animation of workshops "Completing the IDP 2017" on the new HRIS “Cornerstone” platform
- Resolving employee issues with access to the HRIS "SuccessFactors" as part of the annual performance appraisal
- Working on a mentoring program aimed at improving the integration of new employees

✔️ Change Management
- Performing an inventory of the office equipment to be transferred as part of a relocation of 150 people
- Participating in the leading of working groups in relation to the "living together" program as part of the relocation

Tools : Cornerstone, SuccessFactors
